faqs.question: How do I update my profile?
faqs.answer: To update your profile, go to the settings page, make your changes, and click save. You can update your personal information, profile picture, and preferences at any time.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can contact our support team by sending an email to support@nigeriahealthwatch.com or by calling our helpline at +234 800 123 4567. Our support hours are Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm WAT.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, and follow the instructions sent to your registered email address. For security reasons, the password reset link expires after 24 hours.

faqs.question: How do I report a bug or suggest a feature?
faqs.answer: We welcome your feedback! Please email innovation@nigeriahealthwatch.com or use the chat window to share your ideas or report any issues you encounter.

faqs.question: Where can I find my account settings?
faqs.answer: Account settings are accessible from the dropdown menu in the top right corner of the screen when you're logged in. Look for your profile picture or initials.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: We take your privacy seriously. All personal data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with Nigerian data protection regulations.
